title: RBI approves appointment of Pradeep Kumar Sinha as Part-time Chairman of ICICI Bank
description: The RBI has approved Pradeep Kumar Sinha's appointment as Part-time Chairman of ICICI Bank, effective July 1, 2024, for a three-year term.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
